summary: With unprecedented access to the behind the scenes process of the writers, actors and producers, Franco and his crew document what it takes to create one full episode of Saturday Night Live.
cast: Doug Abeles|James Anderson|Fred Armisen|Ken Aymong|Alex Baze|Jessica Conrad|Joe DeTullio|James Downey|Abby Elliott|Will Forte|James Franco|Bill Hader|Darrell Hammond|Steve Higgins|Vince Jolivette|Colin Jost|Erik Kenward|Jamie Klein|Louis Klein|Rob Klein|John Lutz|John Malkovich|Seth Meyers|Lorne Michaels|Kevin Miller|Bobby Moynihan|John Mulaney|Paula Pell|Amy Poehler|Simon Rich|Andy Samberg|Marika Sawyer|Akiva Schaffer|Michael Shoemaker|John Solomon|Emily Sublette|Jason Sudeikis|Swizz Beatz|T.I.|Jorma Taccone|Kenan Thompson|Bryan H. Tucker|Michaela Watkins|Kristen Wiig|Casey Wilson|Hugh Laurie
title: Saturday Night
